channel.title: Need Help Adding Capes To Rsps
channel.description: ok ive downloaded a donator cape thingy from :http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,568641.0.html and i was wondering if someone could help me add them into my server?

item.description:

RSPS can u add me on skype and help me? Skype:RSPSDESIGNER

item.title: Need Help Adding Capes To Rsps
item.dc:creator: @RSPS222 RSPS222
item.description:
@RSPS222 wrote:

1.Get you models and open models file that should be in the Client files 2.Take your model lets say our model name is 19012.dat (Its have to be .dat the model) and Gzip it to 19012.gz 3.put the model in in models file 4.open class8.java and search for if(i == ID), search it for 3 times now we add the ints [ if(i == Item id){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.aString170 = "item name"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Item Description.".getBytes(); class8.anInt174 = Ints you got; class8.anInt181 = Ints you got; class8.anInt190 = Ints you got; class8.anInt198 = Ints you got; class8.anInt204 = Ints you got; class8.anInt169 = Ints you got; class8.anInt194 = Ints you got; class8.anInt165 = Ints you got; class8.anInt200 = Ints you got; class8.anInt188 = Ints you got; class8.anInt164 = Ints you got; class8.anInt175 = Ints you got; class8.anInt197 = Ints you got; }]
hope it helped - :eek:

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Adding Capes To Rsps

item.description:
@Host_Gushers wrote:

[quote=“RSPS222, post:4, topic:467308”][quote author=Host Gushers link=topic=584244.msg4156132#msg4156132 date=1352699772]
ok ive downloaded a donator cape thingy from :http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,568641.0.html and i was wondering if someone could help me add them into my server?
[/quote]
Dont sure
but try this (and allways make backups)
Gzip model and then add to model file i client
and then add the ints into Class8.java OR to item.def what ever you have AND MAKE BACKUP[/quote]
ok im confused can we use skype or sumthing?
